about: Hello, I'm a hardworking and ambitious individual with a great passion for programming and new technologies.
moreAboutMe:
you communicate with clarity and precision. We care about this almost as much as your technical ability.
  you're passionate, even if it's not about analytics. There should be something you know more about than anyone on our team.
  you’ve written 10,000 lines of code that look embarrassing in retrospect. ... and you've written 10,000 lines of good code since then.
  you like fruit, sunshine, and bad jokes. We aren't robots.
  What we're building

descriptions: Delivered working web-based software as per the requirements of the clients.
Design, build, Develop and write advanced programming code completely from scratch.
Build reliable and scalable code while following methodology such as SDLC and Agile.
Assign roles and advise the Junior Developers on projects and Delegate tasks to team members.
Ensure the technical feasibility and tackle bottlenecks of the Projects and tasks.
Reviewing codes for accuracy and functionality.
Oversaw the development from coding front-end to coding back-end and writing tests.
Deployed codebases using CI/CD to the cloud service providers.
Build amazing reusable code and libraries.
Optimize application for maximum speed and scalability.
Created user Interfaces from Prototypes and mock-ups.
Develop and maintain existing libraries.
Assured user input is validated before submitting to Back-end.
Seamlessly Integrated Back-end API with Front-end using HTTP clients.
Wrote Quality Back-end API interfaces for connecting with Front-end.
Used CRUD operations in the Back-end for saving and retrieving data from Database.

projects.name: NowChat
projects.description: A Social media website created by me
descriptions: NowChat is social media website That provides an amazing social media experience.
It has social media Engagement features such as the Love button, Comments, Blogging, Replies etc
It also includes Instant Messaging, Image Upload, and Emoji
In addition to those, it also includes advanced social media features such as LoginWith(OAuth), Social profiling, Following, Dark mode, and Trending.
NowChat is made with Vue.js in the frontend and it's deployed in Netlify.
Whereas it uses Node.js with MongoDB as a database in the backend its deployed in Heroku and MongoDB Atlas.
The code bases are hosted in Github where it also uses CI/CD to deploy with the cloud providers.

projects.name: Budgetlify
projects.description: The best Application for tracking your Budget
descriptions: Budgetlify is a cross-platform Monthly Budget Tracker that helps track monthly expenses, manage budgets, inform overspending before reaching your monthly limit, and visualize your expenditure in an amazing way that can compare expenses and transactions.
Budgetlify is made with React.js in the Frontend and it's deployed in Netlify.
Whereas it uses Python with PostgreSQL as a database in the backend and is deployed in Heroku.
The code bases are hosted in Github where it also uses CI/CD to deploy with the cloud providers.

skills.name: Google Cloud, AWS (S3 & EC2), Netlify & Heroku
Tools (Jira, trello, Asana, Figma, Sketch etc)

resumeOptimizer:
Description
This is a hands-on technical role, day to day activities include:
Delivering working web-based software
Giving advice on technology adoption and selection as it pertains to web solutions. It’s not a project management role although mentoring is encouraged.
Influence and guide the direction of the web-based solutions and ramp up the rest of the team’s web knowledge
What We Can Expect from You
3+ years recent commercial programming with a strong emphasis towards delivering Web solutions
Expert understanding of a wide variety of web technologies, how to design and build websites and web based applications
Significant experience using React (or another major framework like Vue)
Nice to Haves
These aren’t required, but be sure to mention them in your application if you have them.
Experience with TypeScript, ReScript, Go, Node.js, Elixir, or any functional programming language (e.g. OCaml, Haskell, Erlang)
An understanding of server side rendering (e.g. using Next.js with React)
Experience with AWS
Experience working with video streams (RTSP, HLS) and video files
Experience working with HR-related applications
Experience with ReasonML
Experience working with UX Designers & exposure to tools such as Figma, Framer, etc
Japanese language proficiency
skillDescription: Also proficient in Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator, grew up bilingual (English and Klingon).
